name: 12 bananas
description:
The unfortunately frail Banana Boi has lost all 12 of his bananas! Can you help him get them back? Embark on an epic quest and travel the patience-testing path that lies ahead in this infuriatingly challenging, unforgiving, puzzling, memey platformer.

It will not be easy. Many confusing, life-threatening hazards lie between you and your goal. There is no pausing or saving, and no extra lives are granted for most of the game— be wary!

-Experience the satisfaction of finding each hidden banana
-Unveil the mystery of many different areas of various tricky terrains
-Defy loosely observed laws of nature with floating arrows, flying magnets, and really annoying trampolines
-Unlock Steamworks achievements and race the clock to beat previous completion times (should you exhibit the patience to finish at least once)
